EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_MSP_Nurture.4. BGA Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Cover your aircraft engine against the unexpected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Keeping your aircraft engine running safely and efficiently is crucial to your schedule and budget. Designed specifically for Honeywell engines, our Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) – Propulsion is ready to help you do that.
When you enroll in MSP – Propulsion, you get access to an efficient and cost-effective program that enables you to manage future maintenance expenses. Our coverage options help you avoid unplanned maintenance costs, downtime and unnecessary stress. After all, when it comes to your aircraft, time is money.
And that’s not all. We’re making MSP – Propulsion even better by introducing our first Usage-Based Maintenance Service Plan for HTF Series and TFE731-20/40/50/60 propulsion engines. If you own one, you are eligible for a discount of up to 10 percent off the hourly rate for operating your aircraft under optimal conditions.
Choose Honeywell’s MSP – Propulsion <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-propulsion?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]> and make maintenance easy. Choose MSP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-propulsion?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]>
